archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0666
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to complete the onboarding journey offline if I can't do it online, so if I have a low end handset I can still join Vodafone

properties.value: Digital journey for customers who can't complete on phone

Somewhat unclear story description OOTB - can finish an order later on, opening it up from Selfcare. [Jared 28/10] updated wording to "offline" To be discussed internally at Vodafone to check if this one is still needed.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
